## avg() function

Calculates the average of three numbers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function avg(a: number, b: number, c: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | number | First number |
|  b | number | Second number |
|  c | number | Third number |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
